CIA5.original: Hold ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_UP~ to increase your altitude or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_DOWN~ to decrease your altitude.
Hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ while in a vehicle to focus on the target chopper.
CIA5.translated: 在载具中时，按住~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~将镜头对准目标直升机。

CIA5.original: ~r~The helicopter got away.~s~
Let the ~r~helicopter~s~ land, then move in to take it.
CIA5.translated: 等待~r~直升机~s~着陆，然后进去偷走它。

CIA5.original: Hold ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_DOWN~ to descend.
The helicopter got away.
Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to steady the helicopter.
Press ~INPUT_ENTER~ to enter the helicopter.
Hold ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_DOWN~ to descend.
Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ and ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to line up the landing.
Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_ROLL~ to bank the helicopter in the direction you wish to move.
CIA5.translated: 用~PAD_SIXAXIS_ROLL~控制直升机向指定方向倾斜。

CIA5.original: Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_ROLL~ and ~PAD_SIXAXIS_DRIVE~ to steady the helicopter.
Follow the ~r~helicopter.
The helicopter was destroyed.
Use ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_UP~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_DOWN~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_LEFT~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_RIGHT~ to steady the helicopter.
Fly to the ~y~dropoff point~s~ on the south side of the Airport.
CIA5.translated: 飞往位于机场南侧的~y~着陆点。

CIA5.original: Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to bank the helicopter in the direction you wish to move.
CIA5.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~控制直升机向指定方向倾斜。

CIA5.original: ~r~The helicopter was destroyed.~s~
Get a vehicle and go to the ~y~Civilization Plaza.
Use ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_UP~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_DOWN~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_LEFT~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_RIGHT~ to bank the helicopter in the direction you wish to move.
CIA5.translated: 用~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_UP~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_PITCH_DOWN~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_LEFT~~INPUT_VEH_FLY_ROLL_RIGHT~控制直升机向指定方向倾斜。

CIA5.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to rotate the helicopter left or right.
CIA5.translated: 按~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~或~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~使直升机向左或右旋转。

CIA5.original: Land the helicopter next to the Cargo Yard.
CIA5.translated: 将直升机降落在货运区旁。

CIA5.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to rotate the helicopter left or right.
CIA5.translated: 按~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~或~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~使直升机向左或右旋转。

CIA5.original: ~r~The target was spooked.~s~
Leave the helicopter.
Get a vehicle.
The meeting has finished. Take the ~b~helicopter~s~ before it takes off.
CIA5.translated: 会面结束了，在~b~直升机~s~起飞前抢走它。

CIA5.original: Hold ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_UP~ to increase your altitude or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_THROTTLE_DOWN~ to decrease your altitude.
Take the ~b~helicopter.~s~
Fly to the ~y~dropoff point.
The helicopter is leaving, track it to its destination.
CIA5.translated: 直升机正在起飞，跟踪它到目的地。

CIA5.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to line up the landing.
You're losing the ~r~helicopter.~s~
Get back in the ~b~helicopter.
